Package gobblin.util.filters

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AndPathFilter
    Combines multiple PathFilters.
    HiddenFilter
    A PathFilter that filters out hidden files (those starting with '_' or '.').
    RegexPathFilter
    Use a regex to filter Path.
    TarGpgPathFilter
    A PathFilter to accept encrypted tarball files.
